mn42:3.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
mn42:3.3: Tena kho pana samayena verañjakā brāhmaṇagahapatikā sāvatthiyaṃ paṭivasanti kenacideva karaṇīyena.
mn42:3.5: “samaṇo khalu, bho, gotamo sakyaputto sakyakulā pabbajito sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
mn42:3.6: Taṃ kho pana bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ evaṃ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato:
mn42:3.7: ‘itipi so bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussānaṃ buddho bhagavā’.
mn42:3.8: So imaṃ lokaṃ sadevakaṃ samārakaṃ sabrahmakaṃ sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiṃ pajaṃ sadevamanussaṃ sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedeti.
mn42:3.9: So dhammaṃ deseti ādikalyāṇaṃ majjhekalyāṇaṃ pariyosānakalyāṇaṃ sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ;
mn42:3.11: Sādhu kho pana tathārūpānaṃ arahataṃ dassanaṃ hotī”ti.
mn42:4.1: Atha kho verañjakā brāhmaṇagahapatikā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
mn42:4.2: upasaṅkamitvā appekacce bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu;
mn42:4.3: appekacce bhagavatā saddhiṃ sammodiṃsu, sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu;
mn42:4.4: appekacce yena bhagavā tenañjaliṃ paṇāmetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu;
mn42:4.5: appekacce bhagavato santike nāmagottaṃ sāvetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu;
mn42:4.7: Ekamantaṃ nisinnā kho verañjakā brāhmaṇagahapatikā bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ:
mn42:4.8: “ko nu kho, bho gotama, hetu, ko paccayo yena midhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjanti?
mn42:4.9: Ko pana, bho gotama, hetu, ko paccayo yena midhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjantī”ti?
mn42:5.1: “Adhammacariyāvisamacariyāhetu kho, gahapatayo, evamidhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjanti.
mn42:5.2: Dhammacariyāsamacariyāhetu kho, gahapatayo, evamidhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjantī”ti.
mn42:6.1: “Na kho mayaṃ imassa bhoto gotamassa saṅkhittena bhāsitassa, vitthārena atthaṃ avibhattassa, vitthārena atthaṃ ājānāma.
mn42:6.2: Sādhu no bhavaṃ gotamo tathā dhammaṃ desetu yathā mayaṃ imassa bhoto gotamassa saṅkhittena bhāsitassa, vitthārena atthaṃ avibhattassa, vitthārena atthaṃ ājāneyyāmā”ti.
mn42:6.3: “Tena hi, gahapatayo, suṇātha sādhukaṃ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
mn42:6.4: “Evaṃ, bho”ti kho verañjakā brāhmaṇagahapatikā bhagavato paccassosuṃ.
mn42:7.1: “Tividhaṃ kho, gahapatayo, kāyena adhammacārī visamacārī hoti, catubbidhaṃ vācāya adhammacārī visamacārī hoti, tividhaṃ manasā adhammacārī visamacārī hoti.
mn42:8.1: Kathañca, gahapatayo, tividhaṃ kāyena adhammacārī visamacārī hoti?
mn42:8.3: Luddo lohitapāṇi hatappahate niviṭṭho adayāpanno pāṇabhūtesu.
mn42:8.10: Evaṃ kho, gahapatayo, tividhaṃ kāyena adhammacārī visamacārī hoti.
mn42:9.1: Kathañca, gahapatayo, catubbidhaṃ vācāya adhammacārī visamacārī hoti?
mn42:9.14: Evaṃ kho, gahapatayo, catubbidhaṃ vācāya adhammacārī visamacārī hoti.
mn42:10.1: Kathañca, gahapatayo, tividhaṃ manasā adhammacārī visamacārī hoti?
mn42:10.11: Evaṃ kho, gahapatayo, tividhaṃ manasā adhammacārī visamacārī hoti.
mn42:11.1: Evaṃ adhammacariyāvisamacariyāhetu kho, gahapatayo, evamidhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjanti.
mn42:12.1: Tividhaṃ kho, gahapatayo, kāyena dhammacārī samacārī hoti, catubbidhaṃ vācāya dhammacārī samacārī hoti, tividhaṃ manasā dhammacārī samacārī hoti.
mn42:13.1: Kathañca, gahapatayo, tividhaṃ kāyena dhammacārī samacārī hoti?
mn42:13.2: Idha, gahapatayo, ekacco pāṇātipātaṃ pahāya pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti, nihitadaṇḍo nihitasattho lajjī dayāpanno sabbapāṇabhūtahitānukampī viharati.
mn42:13.3: Adinnādānaṃ pahāya adinnādānā paṭivirato hoti, yaṃ taṃ parassa …
mn42:13.7: Evaṃ kho, gahapatayo, tividhaṃ kāyena dhammacārī samacārī hoti.
mn42:14.1: Kathañca, gahapatayo, catubbidhaṃ vācāya dhammacārī samacārī hoti?
mn42:14.2: Idha, gahapatayo, ekacco musāvādaṃ pahāya musāvādā paṭivirato hoti.
mn42:14.12: Evaṃ kho, gahapatayo, catubbidhaṃ vācāya dhammacārī samacārī hoti.
mn42:15.1: Kathañca, gahapatayo, tividhaṃ manasā dhammacārī samacārī hoti?
mn42:15.3: Yaṃ taṃ parassa paravittūpakaraṇaṃ taṃ nābhijjhātā hoti:
mn42:15.6: ‘ime sattā averā abyābajjhā anīghā sukhī attānaṃ pariharantū’ti.
mn42:15.10: Evaṃ kho, gahapatayo, tividhaṃ manasā dhammacārī samacārī hoti.
mn42:16.1: Evaṃ dhammacariyāsamacariyāhetu kho, gahapatayo, evamidhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjanti.
mn42:17.2: ‘aho vatāhaṃ kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā khattiyamahāsālānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjeyyan’ti;
mn42:17.3: ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ vijjati, yaṃ so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā khattiyamahāsālānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjeyya.
mn42:18.2: ‘aho vatāhaṃ kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā brāhmaṇamahāsālānaṃ …
mn42:18.5: ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ vijjati, yaṃ so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā gahapatimahāsālānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjeyya.
mn42:19.2: ‘aho vatāhaṃ kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā cātumahārājikānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjeyyan’ti;
mn42:19.3: ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ vijjati, yaṃ so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā cātumahārājikānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjeyya.
mn42:20.2: ‘aho vatāhaṃ kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā tāvatiṃsānaṃ devānaṃ …
mn42:20.8: ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ vijjati, yaṃ so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā brahmakāyikānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjeyya.
mn42:21.2: ‘aho vatāhaṃ kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā ābhānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjeyyan’ti;
mn42:21.3: ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ vijjati, yaṃ so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā ābhānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjeyya.
mn42:22.2: ‘aho vatāhaṃ kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā parittābhānaṃ devānaṃ …
mn42:22.19: ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ vijjati, yaṃ so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanūpagānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjeyya.
mn42:23.2: ‘aho vatāhaṃ āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihareyyan’ti;
mn42:23.3: ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ vijjati, ‘yaṃ so āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihareyya.
mn42:24.1: Evaṃ vutte, verañjakā brāhmaṇagahapatikā bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ:
mn42:24.3: Seyyathāpi, bho gotama, nikkujjitaṃ vā ukkujjeyya, paṭicchannaṃ vā vivareyya, mūḷhassa vā maggaṃ ācikkheyya, andhakāre vā telapajjotaṃ dhāreyya:
mn42:24.5: evamevaṃ bhotā gotamena anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsito.
mn42:24.6: Ete mayaṃ bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāma dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca.
mn42:24.7: Upāsake no bhavaṃ gotamo dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupete saraṇaṃ gate”ti.
